patthana11.15:1.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naavitakkavicāramattaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naavitakkaavicāraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.15:2.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhacattālīsa, ārammaṇe sattacattālīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane chacattālīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhacattālīsa.
patthana11.15:3.1: Napītisahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasukhasahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naupekkhāsahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.15:4.1: Hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa …pe… purejāte āsevane aṭṭhacattālīsa …pe… avigate ekūnapaññāsa.
patthana11.15:5.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.15:6.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.15:7.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.15:8.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.15:9.1: Naācayagāmiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naapacayagāmiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.15:10.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana11.15:11.1: Nasekkhaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naasekkhaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanevāsekkhanāsekkhaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.15:12.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.15:13.1: Naparittaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… namahaggataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naappamāṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.15:14.1: Hetuyā bāttiṃsa, ārammaṇe sattavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tiṃsa …pe… avigate bāttiṃsa.
patthana11.15:15.1: Naparittārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… namahaggatārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naappamāṇārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekūnapaññāsa.)
patthana11.15:16.1: Nahīnaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… namajjhimaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… napaṇītaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.15:17.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa, vipāke ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.15:18.1: Namicchattaniyataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasammattaniyataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naaniyataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.15:19.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana11.15:20.1: Namaggārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… namaggahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… namaggādhipatiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekūnapaññāsa.)
patthana11.15:21.1: Naanuppannaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nauppādiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana11.15:22.1: Naatītaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naanāgataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana11.15:23.1: Naatītārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naanāgatārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekūnapaññāsa.)
patthana11.15:24.1: Naajjhattaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nabahiddhā nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha dve.)
patthana11.15:25.1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
